name: 曾恕銘
objective: 課程主要為介紹機器學習概念和基本原理，學習 DNN/CNN/LSTM/transformer 的神經網路架構和其他機器學習方法。
schedule:
1.	Introduction with computer tool
2.	DNN with labs and case study radio resource allocation (optional)
3.	Learning method with labs (AI 玩遊戲)
4.	CNN with labs (AI 影像分類 / 物件偵測)
5.	RNN LSTM (AI 聊天機器人 / 翻譯) with lab and case study 5G polar code decoding (optional)
6.	Analogizers: K-means, kNN, SVM
7.	transformer (AI 寫金庸小說 / 寫學習歷程檔案) with case study scene boundary detection (AI 影片分章)
8.	Naïve Bayes classifier (Baysian statistics optional) (AI 判斷貸款會違約嗎)
9.	Symbolists: Decision Tree (AI 判斷貸款會違約嗎)
10.	Autodecoder (AI 影像去雜訊 / 著色) /neural style transfer with labs
11. Deep Reinforcement Learning (AlphaGo 下圍棋勝世界冠軍，OpenAI Five 玩 Dota 2 勝世界冠軍)
scorePolicy:
口頭報告 20%
考試 25%
Lab report 25%
Project 30%
